Major_Arcs.title: The Circus Saga
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Paul Bunyan in a circus setting, his performance, and the ensuing conflict with a vengeful former strongman, Matto Grasso, culminating in a dramatic resolution and Paul's departure.

sub_scenes.title: Circus Spectacle and Public Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets the stage by introducing Paul Bunyan as a circus performer and showing the public's enthusiastic arrival and wonder at the circus.

sub_scenes.title: Intervention and Escalating Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces conflict as a man intervenes in a threatening situation, leading to a more dangerous escalation with a weapon.

narrative_arcs.title: Escalating Threat with a Pistol and Injury

sub_scenes.title: Explanation, Job Offer, and New Role
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene provides backstory on the conflict and transitions into a job offer for Paul Bunyan, changing his role in the circus.

narrative_arcs.title: Explanation of Matto Grasso and Invitation to the Circus
Job Offer as the New Strong Man

sub_scenes.title: Revenge Plot and Thwarted Arson
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Matto Grasso's vengeful plan and Paul Bunyan's quick action to stop his arson attempt.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Circus Performance and Matto Grasso's Envy
Circus Tent Fire and Paul Bunyan's Intervention

sub_scenes.title: Gigantico's Release and The Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Matto Grasso's second act of sabotage, releasing Gigantico, and the ensuing chase and attempts to stop Matto.

narrative_arcs.title: Matto Grasso's New Foul Deed: Releasing Gigantico
Gigantico Escapes and the Pursuit Begins

sub_scenes.title: Arena Fight, Authority Intervention, and Paul's Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene transitions to a different arena spectacle, involving a fight and Paul Bunyan's unexpected intervention, leading to a job offer and his ultimate rejection to return to the North Woods.

narrative_arcs.title: Job Offer and North Woods Rejection

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Tibetan Adventure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Marco Polo's fantastical journey, his encounter with the Ogress of Tibet, rescue of a princess, and acquisition of a magic dagger.

sub_scenes.title: Ogress of Tibet and the Severed Head
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo's new adventure and a strange encounter with a talking severed head in a forest, setting a supernatural tone.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo and the Ogress of Tibet
Discovery of the Severed Talking Head
The Severed Head's Plea for Help

sub_scenes.title: Magic Dagger and Mourning City Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Marco Polo's rescue of a tied man who gifts him a magic dagger, and his arrival at a city in deep mourning.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Rescues a Tied Man and Receives a Magic Dagger

sub_scenes.title: Princess Lotus's Disappearance and the Witch's Castle
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals the reason for the city's mourning – Princess Lotus's disappearance – and leads Marco Polo to a deceptive encounter with a woman and a witch's castle.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco Polo Meets the King of Hi-toun and Learns of Princess Lotus's Disappearance
The Woman in Distress and the Witch's Castle

sub_scenes.title: Ogress's Trap and Combat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Marco Polo entering the castle, discovering the woman's true form as the Ogress, and engaging in combat with monstrous rats.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Castle and the Ogress's Trap
Combat with Monstrous Rats and Defiance Against the Ogress

sub_scenes.title: Ogre's Dungeon and Rescue of Princess
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene transitions to another captive scenario, with a man and woman imprisoned by an ogre, and the woman's rescue using the magic dagger, revealing the rescued woman to be Princess Lotus.

narrative_arcs.title: Dungeon Escape and Journey to the Father

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra and Captain Brooking's Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a tale told by a Treasure Keeper, unfolding a story of betrayal, revenge, and treasure related to Captain Brooking and the Rajah's treasure from Agra.

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Keeper and Penal Colony Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Treasure Keeper as a narrator and establishes the setting in a British penal colony where a prisoner seeks to bargain for freedom.

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Revelation and Escape Agreement
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the prisoner revealing the treasure in Agra to Captain Brooking and their agreement for the prisoner's escape in exchange for the treasure map.

narrative_arcs.title: The Map and the Escape Agreement

sub_scenes.title: Betrayal, Revenge Vow, and Years Later
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Captain Brooking's betrayal and escape with the treasure, leading to Jordan's furious reaction and a vow of revenge spanning years.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Betrayal and Captain's Escape
Furious Denial and Vow of Revenge
Years Later: Release and Return to England

sub_scenes.title: Vigil, Confrontation, and Home Deception
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Jordan's patient wait, the confrontation with Captain Brooking, and Brooking's deceptive invitation to his home.

narrative_arcs.title: Jordan's Vigil and Brooking's Unaware Planning

sub_scenes.title: Attic Betrayal and Violent Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene culminates in Captain Brooking's final betrayal in the attic and the violent confrontation leading to Brooking's downfall and Jordan's escape.

narrative_arcs.title: Journey to the Attic and Betrayal

sub_scenes.title: Police Intervention and Narrator's Moral
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the police responding to the gunshot, Brooking's desperate escape attempt, and concludes with the Treasure Keeper's moral reflection on the story.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Respond to Gunshot and Find Wounded Man
Police Observation and Call for Homicide Squad

Major_Arcs.title: Dr. Styx and the Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Dr. Styx's investigation into the haunted Matthews estate, his confrontation with the vengeful spirit of Vincent Matthews, and the eventual resolution through forgiveness and brotherly love.

sub_scenes.title: Dr. Styx and the Condemned Man
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Dr. Styx and sets up the backstory of Vincent Matthews, a condemned murderer, and the haunted estate.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Supernatural Help and Ominous Warning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Henry Northrup seeking Dr. Styx's expertise for the haunted Matthews estate and the ominous warning upon arrival at the estate.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Ominous Warning at Matthews Estate

sub_scenes.title: Entering the Haunted House and Confrontation with Vincent Matthews
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dr. Styx disregarding the warning, entering the house, and facing the spectral form of Vincent Matthews.

narrative_arcs.title: Disregarding the Warning and Entering the Haunted House

sub_scenes.title: Fight, Capture, and Escape from Vincent Matthews
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the physical and spectral fight between Dr. Styx and Vincent Matthews, Dr. Styx's capture, and his surprising escape due to Vincent's unexpected weakness.

sub_scenes.title: Dialogue on Fear, Forgiveness, and Brotherly Love
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a philosophical dialogue between a cloaked man and Vincent Matthews, exploring themes of violence, fear, and the path to salvation through forgiveness and love.

narrative_arcs.title: Admission of Fear and Search for Salvation
The Sister's Forgiveness and Murder Revelation
Summoning of Rosalind and Her Arrival
Request for Forgiveness and its Granting

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Departure of Spirits
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the haunting storyline with Vincent's remorse, Rosalind's forgiveness, and their peaceful departure, followed by Dr. Styx's reassurance to Mr. Northrup.

narrative_arcs.title: Return to the House and Explanation

Major_Arcs.title: The Voyages of Henry Hudson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts the historical voyages of Henry Hudson, his quest for the Northwest Passage, his ship's journey up the Hudson River, and the tragic mutiny that ended his explorations.

sub_scenes.title: Historical Introduction and First Voyage Proposition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Henry Hudson and his historical context, setting the stage for his first voyage commissioned by the Dutch East India Company.

narrative_arcs.title: The Mysterious Fate of Henry Hudson
The Dutch East India Company's Proposition

sub_scenes.title: First Voyage and Hudson River Exploration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows the Half Moon's voyage, the initial hope and subsequent disappointment upon exploring the Hudson River, and the return to Holland.

narrative_arcs.title: Weeks at Sea and Talk of Mutiny
Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Reflection and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage, Winter Trap, and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene recounts Hudson's second voyage, the ship being trapped in ice during winter, and the eventual eruption of mutiny by the crew.

narrative_arcs.title: Another Voyage for the Northern Passage
Trapped in Ice and Winter Quarters
The Ice Melts and Disagreement on Course

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight and the Rescue of the Princess
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells the story of Hassan, the Arabian Knight, tasked by the Caliph to rescue the kidnapped daughter of Ali-Ben-Ali from the Tartar leader Kurgan, culminating in a duel and a romantic reward.

sub_scenes.title: Summons and Rescue Mission Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Hassan and his skills, and details his summons by the Caliph who briefs him on the mission to rescue the kidnapped princess.

sub_scenes.title: Journey to the Oasis and Traveler's Warning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Hassan's journey to the oasis of El Sholem, where he encounters signs of the Tartars and receives a dire warning from a traveler.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars
Warning and Revelation at the Oasis

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Contact in Tartar Camp
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hassan's infiltration of the Tartar camp, his stealth takedown of a sentry, and his successful contact with the captive princess.

sub_scenes.title: Discovery, Combat, and Duel Agreement
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hassan's discovery by guards, the ensuing combat, his capture, and Kurgan's proposition for a duel to decide the princess's fate.

sub_scenes.title: The Duel and Romantic Conclusion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the duel itself, Hassan's cunning strategy, his victory, Kurgan honoring the agreement, and the blossoming romance with the rescued princess.

narrative_arcs.title: Swift Defeat of the First Opponent
